appearances.title: Power Lunch : CNBC : January 6, 2026 2:00pm-3:01pm EST
appearances.snippet: new york congressman ritchie torres is introducing legislation that would make it illegal for government to use prediction markets to bet on political events using nonpublic or privileged information. now the move comes after a timely bet on the fate of venezuela's nicolas maduro. take a look at the numbers from the bottom of your screen. a brand new account on polymarket wagered more than $30,000 last friday that he would be ousted this month. just hours later, he went into custody. that bet paid out by more than $400,000. i kind of a provocative point of view on this because i want the information in the market like, to some extent that information became public through that bet. but obviously i can understand the need to kind of rein people in. >> why you shouldn't have insiders making profits off. >> don't we want to know about the inside? but maybe they don't keep the profits. >> let's talk about stock trading now in congress. >> thanks for watching power lunch. >> closing bell starts right now. >> and welcome to closing bell. i'm scott wapner live from post nine here at the new yor
